price: "Mas eu digo que Allah é meu Senhor, e não associo ninguém a meu Senhor"
arabic: لَّٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: lākinnā huwa al-lahu rabbī walā ush'riku birabbī aḥadan
